pages.text: Nearly all breeds of rocks are allergic some form of pickaxe.$(br2)While some may be more resilient than others, nearly all rocks will fall to pieces after repeated exposure.$(br2)To ensure your pet rock has a long and healthy life, keep them isolated from any pick or pickaxe-like tool.

Always be sure to check the labels on the back of most rock products where it will be indicated if the item was packaged in a facility that handles pickaxes.$(br2)If possible, only use Sedimentary Friendâ„¢ brand accessories and food when available.
